text: Corgémont is a municipality of the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. It is in the French-speaking part of the canton. Corgémont is in the Jura mountains.Marion F Egge, Pennsylvania German Roots Across the Ocean (Philadelphia, PA: Genealogical Society of Pennsylvania, 2000), p. 129 == Demographics == Corgémont has a population of 1,650 as of 2014. There are 689 families living in Corgémont. Males make up 50.1% of the population. Females make up 49.9%. The average age is 41.6 years. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois
title: Corgémont
